string.text: Hi! You are Strelok right? I am Lieutenant Dudaev, but you can just call me Max. I heard you were around these parts, trying to find something. You want to help us take the high ground? Let's break through and I will present you to our commander. We could be mutually beneficial to each other.
Ok, sounds good, let's go.
No, sorry, I must go alone.
That's a pity, we could really use someone like you. Oh well, good luck to you.
And to you too.
Open the gate marked one, we'll cover you.
Ok, I'm on it
These damn BTRs, cant turn a corner without seeing one!
What should we do?
Wait for the helis to do their job, then come and speak to me.
Ok, sure.
The helicopters failed and we have no experienced personnel left; take this RPG and blow that bastard BTR to smithereens, then we can move forward!
You can count on me.
Have you destroyed the BTR yet?
No, I'm working on it.
Yes, its done.
Good job, let's move forward.
Lead the way.
Damn these mutants, will they ever end?? Keep at it Strelok!
Yes let's get back to it.
Strelok, thanks, you have helped us greatly. Now as I promised, I will present you to our leader, he may know more about the whereabouts of the entrance to this place you seek.
Great, lead the way.

Hi Strelok, I am captain Makarov, finally I can put a face to a name. Dudaev already informed me about the goal of your mission. His friends are my friends too, and after how you have helped us, I guess I can trust you. We are not sure how many monolith troops are nearby and we already lost our snipers. Are you capable of driving this BTR?
Of course: cars, bikes, BTRs, all the same right?..

Yeah... good, good. At least you've had some driving experience... Lieutenant, you come with us, your guys can stay here and rest a bit. Ok Strelok, we are ready when you are, climb in and we can start this operation.
Ok, let's go.
BTR? Are you kidding me?! I'm experienced enough to do it without BTR.
Yeah... good, good. At least you've had some experience... Lieutenant, you come with us, your guys can stay here and rest a bit. Ok Strelok, are you ready? Let's go.
Ok, let's go.

Thank you for helping us, Strelok! I knew you were a trustworthy guy... We will hold this position until the NPP is fully under our control. If you have any problems in future, just find me and I'll help where I can.
Of course, thanks.

The Sarcophagus is near to your current position, I guess it's the main reason why you are here, the code to the door is 4237. I wish you good luck stalker! You have free pass here. Hope we meet again one day.
Thanks and good luck to you.
Hey, stalker, you're just in time. If you are keen, we are about to assault the mono bastards and could use a good strong lad like yourself. What do you say are you in or out?
No thanks, I think I'll take my chances on my own.
Sure, why not, what do you have in mind for me?

I'll admit I recognize your face, Strelok, I know you are an accomplished stalker. I have a special task for you. There is a BTR in our path that needs to be eliminated. I have two choppers waiting for the signal. All you need to do is place this here tranceiver as near to the btr as you can and the choppers will do the rest. Game?
No thanks, too risky, I'll take my chances thanks.
Ok, I'll do it.
Good. Remember, place it as near as you can and get the hell out of there! We'll fight through the first resistance, then hang back until the choppers have done their thing.
Ok I'm on it.
Remember, place the transceiver as close as possible. When it's close enough, it will signal the choppers. We'll rush in after they've done their job.
Roger that.

Good job stalker, I knew I could count on you. I need help with one more thing please. I sent out a recon group to find the entrance to the underground here, but they never returned. Please can you try and find them and see if they were successful?
No thanks, I'm on a mission and have been delayed too long already.
Sure, I'm going that way, I'll keep an eye out for them.
Thanks marked one, at least we know they succeeded in their quest and they died heroes!..
Yes, yes they did.

Hey man. Wow, crazy battle that was. I saw you in action and i was impressed! I need help with something please. I sent out a recon group to find the entrance to the underground here, but they never returned. Please can you try and find them and see if they were successful?
